entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
